price: 85 - Nous[1382] sommes alors plus proche du mourant que vous sans que vous vous en aperceviez -
arabic: وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wanaḥnu aqrabu ilayhi minkum walākin lā tub'ṣirūna
